column2:
'Data encryption'
'Azure Machine Learning uses a variety of compute resources and data stores on the'
'Azure platform. To learn more aout how each of these supports data encryption at rest'
'and in transit, see Data encryption with Azure Machine Learning.'
'Data exfiltration prevention (preview)'
'Azure Machine Learning has several inound and outound network dependencies.'
'Some of these dependencies can expose a data exfiltration risk y malicious agents'
'within your organization. These risks are associated with the outound requirements to'
'Azure Storage, Azure Front Door, and Azure Monitor. For recommendations on'
'mitigating this risk, see the Azure Machine Learning data exfiltration prevention article.'
